mdRecord.dcterms:title: Style's practical register: begun in the reign of King Charles I consisting of rules, orders, and the principal observations concerning the practice of the common law in the courts at Westminster : particularly the King's Bench, as well in matters criminal as civil : carefully continued down to this time from Modern reports : alphabetically digested under several titles : with a table for the ready finding out of those titles
Practical register

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for C. Harper, D. Brown, J. Walthoe, and D. Midwinter
